entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
